html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-02192019-03-25,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Repealing the Atlantic Pilotage Authority Non-compulsory Area Regulations
PrecisRegulations Repealing the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE AUTHORITY NON-COMPULSORY AREA REGULATIONS in order to provide the Authority with some means to license and ensure the availability of pilots who would operate in the waters not established as compulsory pilotage areas during the winter months, when navigation through the Gulf of St. Lawrence and the St. Lawrence River can be difficult due to ice.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0080 Publication Date: 2019-04-03
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Repealing the Atlantic Pilotage Authority Non-compulsory Area Regulations
precis: Regulations Repealing the ATLANTIC PILOTAGE AUTHORITY NON-COMPULSORY AREA REGULATIONS in order to provide the Authority with some means to license and ensure the availability of pilots who would operate in the waters not established as compulsory pilotage areas during the winter months, when navigation through the Gulf of St. Lawrence and the St. Lawrence River can be difficult due to ice.
